item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Customer Settings - Groups - CRUD
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Customer Settings - Groups - CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop Parameters > Customer Settings > Groups The page should be displayed correctly Click “Add new group” The “Add new” page should be displayed correctly Create a new Customer group > Save Message “Successful creation” is displayed Click on “Tester” The detail page is displayed correctly Click on the tab “Groups” The groups page is displayed correctly
